document_data.name: ''Jhiarl''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Jhiarl''''', also called the '''''Emerald Tapal''''' and '''Elfkiller''' was a magical sentient [[tapal]], a traditional weapon of the [[triton]]s of [[Serôs]].
document_data.Personality: It was claimed that ''Jhiarl'' chose its own wielder. When their need was great, a rogue water current would coil up and along their arm and finally solidify into a tapal, becoming ''Jhiarl''. However, it often possessed the wielder with its own evil intelligence.
document_data.History: It was much used in the fall of [[Aryselmalyr]], earning it its sobriquet.
